item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Monday, February 24, 2025 at 1:25 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Building a BitTorrent client from the ground up in Go (124 points | 36 comments)
2. i built an app to stop me doomscrolling by literally touching grass (34 points | 11 comments)
3. Show HN: I scrape Steam data every month and it's yours to download for free (14 points | 2 comments)

7. Microsoft Cancels Leases for AI Data Centers, Analyst Says (161 points | 97 comments)
8. Torvalds: You can avoid Rust as a C maintainer, but you can't interfere with it (89 points | 37 comments)

10. Fast Cash vs. Slow Equity (50 points | 22 comments)

26. Sublinear Time Algorithms (100 points | 52 comments)
27. The benefits of learning in public (243 points | 69 comments)

29. Orchid's nutrient theft from fungi shows photosynthesis-parasitism continuum (73 points | 9 comments)
30. But good sir, what is electricity? (371 points | 193 comments)
